Posts.EditableText:
Hi again,

Is there any way to create a synonym that runs throughout all scripts in a Quest 5 game? I think I remember being able to define them in Quest 2 a million years ago, but can't find the functionality in 5, and for some reason the searching the wiki for 'synonym' finds no pages!

Thanks for reading.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Is this for a build-in command or verb? If so, create your own version of the command/verb (bottom-left corner, select to show library elements, find the command or verb, click "Copy" top-right), and modify the pattern.

Does that make sense?
